document.full_text: darren aronofsky is bowing out of directing 20th century fox's sequel "the wolverine," saying the project would keep him out of the country for too long.
document.title: darren aronofsky bows out of "wolverine"
lines_and_colors: darren aronofsky is bowing out of directing 20th century fox's sequel "the wolverine," saying the project would keep him out of the country for too long.
